lead_paragraph: REICHENBACH--Karen. Passed peacefully with family by her side on April 5. Loving wife of Herb and mother to Samantha and Jenna. Family was her greatest joy; always in touch with her Southern roots. Quilter extraordinaire, master gardener, designer, Village Trustee, and cultural enthusiast. Her passion for life and infectious laughter will be dearly missed. Memorial Service Saturday, April 9, 9:30am at UUCSR, 48 Shelter Rock Rd., Manhasset, NY. Donations may be made to the Ovarian Cancer Research Fund Alliance. 1/3
